'''Deborah''' is one of a pair of sisters whose B&B caught fire.

==History==
Deborah and her sister, Sue, put all their money into opening a B&B. The night before it opened, Deborah was preparing for the opening while Sue sat and drank wine, upsetting Deborah. While Deborah was baking welcome cookies, the oven caught on fire. It spread to her oven mitt, which she threw. They called the fire department and the fire, which was contained to the stove top, was quickly extinguished.

They were later called back to the B&B with a much larger fire raging. The kitchen was engulfed in flames. Sue had looked for Deborah, but couldn't find her. They went inside and put out the fire, but realized quickly that there was still a reignition point. They had to turn off the gas to the oven to stop the fire from reigniting again. Andy then found Deborah, who had a leg wound and was trapped. She walked past bursting wine bottles to get to her and then helped her back out of the house. While they were escaping, she inhaled some glass, compromising her airway. Outside, intubation was unsuccessful, so Maya criked her and then started CPR. They then took her to the hospital.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
She is divorced. She went to Sue with the B&B idea after the divorce was finalized.

===Familial===
She and her sister decided to open a B&B together.

==Career==
She and her sister are in the process of opening a B&B.

==Notes and Trivia==
*The B&B is located at 479 Sunken Meadow Road.
